枚.definition: classifier for small objects: coins, badges, rings, carved seals, chess pieces, eggs, fingerprints etc (more formal than 個|个[ge4]); classifier for bombs, missiles, satellites etc; (on product packaging) classifier for flat items (from Japanese 枚 "mai"); (old) stick used as a gag to prevent soldiers from talking while sneaking up on the enemy

枚乘.definition: Mei Cheng (-c. 140 BC), Han dynasty poet

枚卜.definition: to choose officials by divination (archaic); to practice divination without a definite question
